column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Friday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from September 3 to September 23, 2002.      The minutes are attached.Attachment (73 KB PDF)2002 Monetary policyHome |News and eventsAccessibility Last update: November 15, 2002
